title: 2022 Mondraker Foxy Carbon goes more enduro w/ adjustable geometry and stiffer rear
content:
In conjunction with the release of their all-new 130mm travel do-it-all, Mondraker have overhauled their enduro bike releasing the 2022 Foxy Carbon in three models. Still a 150mm travel 29er, the Foxy Carbon gets a new kinematic, a reinforced rear-end, a lower and slacker geometry that is now adjustable, as well as a MIND of

The post 2022 Mondraker Foxy Carbon goes more enduro w/ adjustable geometry and stiffer rear appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
